Repealing the #ACA would rip essential health services from some of our nation’s most vulnerable populations. In the Senate Indian Affairs Committee, I’m working w/ my colleagues to protect Native American, Alaska Natives & Native Hawaiians’ access to vital health care resources.

My family’s experience with Alzheimer’s makes this issue personal for me. That is why as Senator, I’ve fought to find new ways to tackle Alzheimer’s Disease and incentivize early detection. Read more about what I’m doing to strive for a cure: https://seniorspectrumnewspapers.com/bold-act-boosts-treatment-and-care-for-alzheimers-patients/ …

I know the stakes and I will continue to fight every day to protect and improve the #ACA alongside @GovSisolak & @SenJackyRosen because Nevadans deserve quality, affordable health care. The financial future of their families and their health depend on it. pic.twitter.com/V9NGEysioQ
And we’re listening to the voices of Nevadans and sharing their stories of how the Affordable Care Act has protected their families and improved their health.
.@GovSisolak , @SenJackyRosen and I are coming together today to say, enough is enough, on behalf of thousands of Nevadans that have gained access to affordable health care thanks to the #ACA.
In just the past few weeks, the DOJ and President Trump have signed on to a lawsuit that would eviscerate health care protections enjoyed by families in Nevada and across the country.
When I hear from Nevadans, they tell me their top concern is how to afford health care. They’re rightly concerned about this Administration’s continued assault on their care.

The courageous men and women who’ve immigrated to America and risked their lives to serve our country should not face deportation upon their return to civilian life. That's why I cosponsored the I-VETS Act intro’d by @SenDuckworth. Learn more here:  http://bit.ly/2TTBO2g

The State of Nevada’s Veterans Coordinator is holding a career fair for Nevada veterans, military, and members of the public tomorrow in Reno. A big thank you to @GovSisolak for hosting this event to support our troops.
